Instinctive Bite.display: You bite at your foe, twice!
Instinctive Bite.help:
Bite attack:
Accuracy: 15
Damage: 1d6+2
Attacks:2
Strong vs dodge, weak vs brace.
Duplicates: Increase accuracy by 5

Instinctive Claws.display: You slash at your foe repeatedly!
Instinctive Claws.help:
Claw attack:
Accuracy: 5
Damage: 2d6+4
Attacks:3
Strong vs deflect, weak vs dodge.
Duplicates: Increase attacks by 1
